text.section: There is an Advisory Board on After-School and Summer Opportunity programs in the Program.

section.section: There is an Executive Committee of the Advisory Board.
The Governor shall serve as the chair of the Advisory Board and of the Executive Committee.
The Governor may designate the Lieutenant Governor or one of the secretaries serving on the Advisory Committee and the Executive Committee to act as chair in the Governor's absence.

text.section: The Advisory Board shall develop a strategy to provide technical assistance through the Maryland Out of School Time Network.
